trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the scarab is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the scarab move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the scarab is animate.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.
